name: urea-1-carboxylate amidohydrolase
comment: The yeast enzyme (but not that from green algae) also catalyses the reaction of EC 6.3.4.6 urea carboxylase, thus bringing about the hydrolysis of urea to CO2 and NH3 in the presence of ATP and bicarbonate. R00774 (6.3.4.6)
